sentences: Ta sai pealt oma s천bra k채est kingi.
Meie pere elab pealt m채e jalamal.
context: The Estonian word 'pealt' is a postposition that indicates location or perspective. It can mean 'from' when indicating origin, 'above' or 'on top of' when referring to physical position, or 'beside' when indicating proximity. In different contexts, it shows where something is coming from (origin), positioned above, or located next to.
